import React, { useState } from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import cl from './style.module.css' import djostik1 from '../images/djostik1.png' import djostik2 from '../images/djostik2.png' import djostik3 from '../images/djostik3.png' import djostik4 from '../images/djostik4.png' import djostik5 from '../images/djostik5.png' import {ReactComponent as Sart} from '../images/star.svg' import {ReactComponent as EmptyStar} from '../images/emptystar.svg' export default function DetailsPage() { const [itemDetails, setItemDetails] = useState([ { id: 1, itemName: 'Havic HV G-92 Gamepad', rating: 4, reviews: 150, instock: true, price: 192.00, aboutItem: 'PlayStation 5 Controller Skin High quality vinyl with air channel adhesive for easy bubble free install & mess free removal Pressure sensitive.', colours: ['blue', 'red'], sizes: ['xs', 's', 'm', 'l', 'xl'] } ]) function getrating(num){ const starList = [] const emptyStarList = [] for(let i = 1; i <= num; i++){ starList.push() } } return ( <>

) }
